title: Leaked LG Nexus 5X renders show off new colour option | Trusted Reviews
description:
![Nexus
5X](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

**Purported press renders of the forthcoming[LG Nexus
5X](https://www.trustedreviews.com/nexus-5x-review) have again leaked online
ahead of Google’s launch event later this month.**

Following the [packaging leak which confirmed the
name](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/nexus-5x-and-nexus-6p-packaging-
leaks) earlier on Wednesday, Android Police has obtained
[images](http://www.androidpolice.com/2015/09/23/exclusive-behold-the-leaked-
press-renders-of-lgs-nexus-5x-in-white-black-and-greenish-blue/) that show off
the range of available colours.

The renders show the pure Android handset in white, black and a greenish blue
dubbed ‘Ice Blue,’

These colours tie in with an Amazon listing promising the same three shades.

The Nexus 5X, which will replace the current Nexus 5, is expected to arrive
with a 5.2-inch full HD screen, Snapdragon 808 SoC and Type-C USB
connectivity.

**See also:[Best Android smartphones
2015](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best-android-phones-1_round-up)**

The Nexus 5X along with the Huawei-built Nexus 6P are expected to be
officially announced on September 29 at a specially convened Google event
